title: Disneyland Paris stays are going from £94pp at Disney hotels with park tickets
text:

Disneyland Paris makes for a pretty magical break but the price tag isn't always quite as dreamy.

While there are ways to find cheap Disneyland Paris deals , that doesn't always mean you can find packages with a Disney Hotel - and the latter can make for that extra sprinkle of magic thanks to themed rooms, character appearances and early access to the parks.

However thanks to a new deal you can currently bag two-night breaks from £94pp which includes a stay at a Disney Hotel AND your park tickets.

That includes the likes of Disney's Hotel Santa Fe, Disney's Hotel Cheyenne or Disney's Davy Crockett Ranch, and entry to both Disneyland Park and Walt Disney Studios Park.

The My First Disney Offer will be available exclusively for families with children aged under seven, so it's ideal if you're looking to do something special for your little ones.

You can already book the deal on the MagicBreaks website but you'll need to book by the 27th November when the offer ends.

(Image: Disneyland Paris)

For example, you could bag two nights from £94pp at Disney's Hotel Cheyenne with three-day Disney Parks entry. (Price based on two adults and two children under seven sharing a Woody's Roundup Standard Room).

The packages don't include your transport, although you can opt to add these on as extras when you book.

(Image: Disneyland Paris)

However, you do get some fun FREE extras such as a magical call from Mickey Mouse to announce your stay and a Disney Activity Book. Oh, and they will even throw in 15 per cent off dining at Planet Hollywood and Earl of Sandwich.

There's quite a generous window of travel dates, as the offer is valid for Wednesday to Sunday arrivals, between the 7th November 2019 through to the 31st March 2020.

That means you could find deals whether you're tied to the school holiday dates or not - and the dates coincide with heaps of exciting events such as Disneyland Paris' brand new Frozen Celebration (complete with new shows) and the parks' Christmas events .
description: Disneyland Paris breaks are currently going from £94pp and that includes a Disney hotel stay and your park tickets
